descriptionHtml:
[center][/center] [center][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/PnBzA6.gif[/img][/center][center][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/qjRnaB.gif[/img][/center][center][/center][center][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/9gEl3o.gif[/img][/center]                       [color=#0000ff] [center][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/77PZpP.gif[/img][/center][/color]
[i][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/g2yRDZ.gif[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Rashid is a male, Redguard follower who can be recruited in the Warmaiden's in Whiterun to join your travels. He fights in dual wield style as well as with a bow.Rashid was born in an unknown region of the Alik'r Desert. When he was a child, he lost his family in a war between two clans and after a while, he was adopted by a stranger named Hassan. Hassan was the leader of an assassin group and from childhood, he trained Rashid for one thing only... To kill..
Rashid had a last mission... He failed... Now he has to fight for his life...[/size]

[/color][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/zaYq7g.gif[/img]
[i][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]Combat Assassin[/size][/color][/i]
[img]http://i.hizliresim.com/418OvY.gif[/img]
[i][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]Merchant Clothes(When he is a follower he will wear his own unique clothes)[/size][/color][/i]
[img]http://i.hizliresim.com/GP5XOv.gif[/img]
[size=4]1-[i]Enc.Boots(Wearer is muffled and moves silently)[/i]
2-Enc.Clothes(Health regenerates 20% faster)
3-Enc.Hood(One handed attacks do 25% more damage)
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/OVBOp3.gif[/img]
[/size][/color][size=4]Daedric Dagger x2
Bow[/size]
[/i][color=#ff0000][size=5][i][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/Jq6ByE.gif[/img]
[/i][/size][/color][size=4]Overdraw(20)
Armsman(20)
Dualflurry
Stealth(20)
Backstab
MuffledMovement
LightFoot
SilentRoll[/size]
[color=#0000ff]

[/color][color=#ff0000][size=6][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/PnBzjv.gif[/img]
[/size][/color][size=4]Huge questline
Special enemies (in progress)
Voice acting

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=6][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/9gElj9.gif[/img]
[/size][/color]Download and open Data folder in my mod than simply drag&drop your Skyrim Data folder.(Be sure esp file is active)

[u][color=#ff0000]Mod Compatibility
[/color][/u]I play with him 10+ hours and still not any issues 100+ mods...

If you have a problem with AFT please load before AFT esp in your game.(Exam:Skyrim-Update bla bla bla Rashid.esp-Amazing Follower Tweaks.esp)

[color=#ff0000][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/g2yRQL.gif[/img]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos-Renewal[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756]LogRaam[/url]

[/size][/color]Last Notes:I made him with my low end laptop and sorry for SS (Please add some SS) and sorry for my bad English.One more thing this is my 2nd follower mod and i am new that mod jobs if you experience minor problems don't hurt me much lol.I'll try my best shot promise :)
author: RolloTheBerserker
